titles.title: A bill to amend section 558 of the Tax Reform Act of 1984 with respect to the treatment of certain collective bargaining agreements.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/23/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1984 to extend from September 26, 1980, to June 12, 1982, the date by which a specified employer (Master Chemical Company) in Ohio may withdraw from a multiemployer pension plan and still have its liability to the plan voided.
